articles.author: Brittany Lyte, The Associated Press
articles.title: Maui Doctor Who Promoted Dubious Covid Treatments Joins RFK’s Vaccine Panel - Honolulu Civil Beat
articles.description: The advisory committee makes recommendations to the CDC on what vaccines the American public should take each year.
articles.content:
The advisory committee makes recommendations to the CDC on what vaccines the American public should take each year.
Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. on Monday named a Maui children’s physician… [+6138 chars]
